desc: Boosts Atk and Def by 15% & absorbs HP from normal attacks

dictionary.lore: A gleaming aegis found deep in a cave up in the mountains. No one knew who it belonged to, or why was it left in a cave, but its discovery stirred up quite a buzz among Summoners as its appearance greatly resembled the Royal Aegis. It is believed that it was made by the same person who created the legendary aegis.

name: Silver Aegis
